brainstorm.template:
Help me brainstorm and design: $ARGUMENTS

Follow the brainstorming skill approach:
1. First understand the current project context
2. Ask questions one at a time to refine the idea
3. Prefer multiple choice questions when possible
4. Propose 2-3 different approaches with trade-offs
5. Present design in sections of 200-300 words
6. Validate each section before moving on

Key principles:
- YAGNI ruthlessly - remove unnecessary features
- Explore alternatives before settling
- Be flexible - go back and clarify when needed
brainstorm.description: Brainstorm and refine ideas into designs using Socratic dialogue

write-plan.template:
Create a detailed implementation plan for: $ARGUMENTS

Follow the writing-plans skill approach:
1. Break work into bite-sized tasks (2-5 minutes each)
2. Each task is one action with clear verification
3. Include exact file paths
4. Include complete code snippets (not 'add validation')
5. Include exact commands with expected output
6. Follow DRY, YAGNI, TDD principles
7. Plan frequent commits

Save the plan to docs/plans/YYYY-MM-DD-<feature-name>.md
write-plan.description: Create detailed implementation plan with exact file paths and code
